attributes.action: Frivolous pleas of 'Not Guilty' should attract a double sentencing tariff.
attributes.additional_details: After being caught on CCTV causing criminal damage, looting, etc, if the person pleads 'Not Guilty' and is then found to be 'Guilty' by the courts, they should face a double tariff punishment for wasting the public's time  -   (the courts belong to the public...)
